title: Quadropod
shortDescription: A four-legged robotic platform engineered for balance, mobility, and smart control—where hardware meets intelligent motion.

detailSections.title: Introduction
detailSections.content: Quadropod is a four-legged robotic platform designed for stability and adaptability. Unlike wheeled robots, it can navigate uneven terrain with ease. This project explores the intersection of mechanical engineering, electronics, and software control loops.

detailSections.title: Features
detailSections.content:
• **Inverse Kinematics**: Calculates precise servo angles for smooth foot positioning.
• **Self-Balancing**: Uses IMU data to maintain stability on slopes.
• **Wireless Control**: Operated via a custom mobile app over Bluetooth/WiFi.
